sub_topic: Identifying the perfect matching in a graph.
message_1:
Consider the graph G shown below:

```
A----B
|\  /|
| \/ |
| /\ |
|/  \|
C----D
```

Find a perfect matching of G.
message_2:
A perfect matching in graph G is a set of edges that covers every vertex exactly once. In this graph, one possible perfect matching is:

A-C, B-D
